content: **knitted shawl in drops merino extra fine or drops daisy piece is knitted sideways in english rib size s - l** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #scarlethushshawl drops design pattern me-295 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l width approx 20-24 cm length from tip to tip approx 143-160 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200 g colour 35 dark heather or use drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200 g colour 36 bordeaux **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 44 row vertically in english rib on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
